title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 9 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 9 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will praise thee, O LORD, with my whole heart; I will shew forth all thy marvellous works.
lineList.cn: 我要一心称谢耶和华。我要传扬你一切奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: I will be glad and rejoice in thee: I will sing praise to thy name, O thou most High.
lineList.cn: 我要因你欢喜快乐。至高者阿，我要歌颂你的名。

lineList.en: When mine enemies are turned back, they shall fall and perish at thy presence.
lineList.cn: 我的仇敌转身退去的时候，他们一见你的面，就跌倒灭亡。

lineList.en: For thou hast maintained my right and my cause; thou satest in the throne judging right.
lineList.cn: 因你已经为我伸冤，为我辨屈。你坐在宝座上，按公义审判。

lineList.en: Thou hast rebuked the heathen, thou hast destroyed the wicked, thou hast put out their name for ever and ever.
lineList.cn: 你曾斥责外邦。你曾灭绝恶人。你曾涂抹他们名，直到永永远远。

lineList.en: O thou enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end: and thou hast destroyed cities; their memorial is perished with them.
lineList.cn: 仇敌到了尽头。他们被毁坏，直到永远。你拆毁他们的城邑。连他们的名号，都归于无有。

lineList.en: But the LORD shall endure for ever: he hath prepared his throne for judgment.
lineList.cn: 惟耶和华坐着为王，直到永远。他已经为审判设摆他的宝座。

lineList.en: And he shall judge the world in righteousness, he shall minister judgment to the people in uprightness.
lineList.cn: 他要按公义审判世界，按正直判断万民。

lineList.en: The LORD also will be a refuge for the oppressed, a refuge in times of trouble.
lineList.cn: 耶和华又要给受欺压的人作高台，在患难的时候作高台。

lineList.en: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，认识你名的人要倚靠你。因你没有离弃寻求你的人。

lineList.en: Sing praises to the LORD, which dwelleth in Zion: declare among the people his doings.
lineList.cn: 应当歌颂居锡安的耶和华，将他所行的传扬在众民中。

lineList.en: When he maketh inquisition for blood, he remembereth them: he forgetteth not the cry of the humble.
lineList.cn: 因为那追讨流人血之罪的，他记念受屈的人，不忘记困苦人的哀求。

lineList.en: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; consider my trouble which I suffer of them that hate me, thou that liftest me up from the gates of death:
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你是从死门把我提拔起来的。求你怜恤我。看那恨我的人所加给我的苦难。

lineList.en: That I may shew forth all thy praise in the gates of the daughter of Zion: I will rejoice in thy salvation.
lineList.cn: 好叫我述说你一切的美德。我必在锡安城的门因你的救恩欢乐。

lineList.en: The heathen are sunk down in the pit that they made: in the net which they hid is their own foot taken.
lineList.cn: 外邦人陷在自己所掘的坑中。他们的脚，在自己暗设的网罗里缠住了。

lineList.en: The LORD is known by the judgment which he executeth: the wicked is snared in the work of his own hands. Higgaion. Selah.
lineList.cn: 耶和华已将自己显明了，他已施行审判。恶人被自己手所作的缠住了。

lineList.en: The wicked shall be turned into hell, and all the nations that forget God.
lineList.cn: 恶人，就是忘记神的外邦人，都必归到阴间。

lineList.en: For the needy shall not alway be forgotten: the expectation of the poor shall not perish for ever.
lineList.cn: 穷乏人必不永久被忘，困苦人的指望，必不永远落空。

lineList.en: Arise, O LORD; let not man prevail: let the heathen be judged in thy sight.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你起来，不容人得胜。愿外邦人在你面前受审判。

lineList.en: Put them in fear, O LORD: that the nations may know themselves to be but men. Selah.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你使外邦人恐惧。愿他们知道自己不过是人。（细拉）
